name: BEFRIENDER
description:
IF YOU HAVE PERFORMANCE ISSUES, TRY THE WINDOWS INSTALLABLE VERSION OR USE CHROME

A prophecy as old as time comes to fruition in this side-scrolling platformer. Play as Timmy (and friends) to defeat an evil force destined to wreak havoc on the world.

Controls:

WASD + Space for movement

Escape for pause. (You may need to press twice for the HTML version)
